repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary: Text of the work attributed to Śaṅkara and <title>Lakṣmīdharā</title> commentary. Text and commentary in Sanskrit. This manuscript should logically have been attributed a shelfmark 'sanscrit' in the BnF collection.

support.p: Different types of papers: thiner for U1, f93-f95.

collation.desc: the front cover; verso bearing sticker <quote>Indien 500</quote>.
1 unfoliated/unpaginated front guard leaf; recto bearing <quote>Tam. 500</quote> in black ink and <quote>Tamoul N° 500</quote> in black pencil; verso blank.
2 unfoliated/unpaginated front guard leaves; blank recto verso.
95 ff; Tamil original pagination 1-129/unpaginated page/130-188 and parallel library Arabic library foliation 1-95.
2 unfoliated/unpaginated back guard leaves; blank recto verso.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation. The binding is partly unbound.

additions.desc: Stamp <quote>SOCIÉTÉ ASIATIQUE DON COLLECTION ARIEL</quote> (U1, f1r).
Stamp <quote>BIBLIOTHÈQUE IMPÉRIALE MSS.</quote> (U1, f1r and f95r) and <quote>DON N°</quote> (U1, f1r).
Corrections in later black ink. Crossed-out portions.

binding.p: Leather (brown) covers; title <quote>SAONDARYALAHARI VYAKHYANAM</quote> and decoration on the spine.

origin.origDate: Earlier than 1855, since part of the bequest by Edouard Ariel (as attested by stamp on U1, f1r) to the Société Asiatique, received in 1855. Written by Rāmasvāli Śāstrin in the year Parābhava of the Jovian cycle, that is, mosy probably 1846-1847.

provenance.p: Owned by <persName ref="https://catalogue.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/cb143513141" key="Ariel, Edouard (1818-1854)">Edouard Ariel</persName> (1818-1854). Bequested by Edouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received (gift) by the BnF from the Société Asiatique in 1866 (BnF, <title>Registre des dons B</title>, no. 1192).

Rosny, Léon de (1868). “La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry.” In: <title>Variétés orientales</title> (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.
